thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: I love this place
thread.title_full: I love this place - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: DGFG81
title: I love this place
text:
I booked this hotel by reading reviews from TripAdvisor and Expedia site. Everything as reviews have said. Hotel and Staffs went above and beyond on services. I want to give them more stars but TripAdvisor has max only 5
Pro.: Reasonable price, The best hotel staffs I have ever seen, friendly, helpful, humorous, clean room, the best services and good amenities, this hotel has the best breakfast, Close to all kind of transportations, can walk to almost every landmarks.
Con: I have nothing to say
I recommend IQ Hotel Roma for all Travelers who visit Rome
Ciao!!
